price: 44. Dan jika mereka melihat gumpalan-gumpalan awan berjatuhan dari langit, mereka berkata, "Itu adalah awan yang bertumpuk-tumpuk.”
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina al-samāi sāqiṭan yaqūlū saḥābun markūmun
